incident_updates.body:
• 2014-03-11 21:29:45 - We are currently investigating connectivity issues to GitHub.com. We will update status once we know more.
  • 2014-03-11 21:39:37 - We continue to investigate connectivity problems to GitHub.com. We'll update when we know more.
  • 2014-03-11 22:02:20 - We have identified the problem and are working to restore service as quickly as we can.
  • 2014-03-11 22:10:58 - The site is recovering but we continue to monitor the situation very closely.
  • 2014-03-11 22:32:03 - We're all working hard to restore service as quickly as possible.
  • 2014-03-11 22:39:19 - The site is once again responsive and we believe we have a handle on the problem. We will continue to monitor things very closely.
  • 2014-03-11 23:13:08 - GitHub.com continues to operate normally, but we are performing some additional maintenance before we return to green status.
  • 2014-03-11 23:22:08 - We're investigating problems connecting to GitHub.com.
  • 2014-03-11 23:34:35 - GitHub.com is once again responsive. We have all hands on deck mitigating an evolving series of DDoS attacks.
  • 2014-03-12 00:04:32 - GitHub.com is operating normally, despite an ongoing DDoS attack. The mitigations we have in place are proving effective in protecting us and we're hopeful that we've got this one resolved.

components.name: Git Operations
components.description: Performance of git clones, pulls, pushes, and associated operations
